thread.title: Happy Chappy
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Happy Chappy

author: Happy Chappy
title: Happy Chappy
text: Cannot praise highly enough. Foremost, the pricing is competitive. The quality of product is good and the delivery extremely prompt. Formative feedback :please update your website so it's more user friendly and easy browse. Sure I would make more spontaneous purchases l. Thanks CEX
